N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4.2 - Executive order no. 2: establishing the position of state director of criminal justice

State Regulations
WHEREAS, The effective and efficient operation of the
criminal justice system depends in large measure upon coordination among the
various State criminal justice agencies and between State and local criminal
justice agencies; and
WHEREAS, Proper coordination will ensure that criminal
justice resources are fully maximized and appropriately allocated; and
WHEREAS, To foster such an effort, it is desirable that one
person, designated by the Governor, assume primary responsibility and
accountability for coordination in the State criminal justice system; NOW, THEREFORE, I, Mario M. Cuomo, Governor of the State of

New York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and Laws
of the State of New York, do hereby establish the position of State Director of

Criminal Justice. I. Powers and

Responsibilities. The State Director of Criminal Justice shall: assume primary responsibility for the coordination of
criminal justice information systems in New York State; act as the Governor's chief spokesperson in connection with
matters relating to the criminal justice system; advise the Governor in connection with criminal
justice-related matters; identify statewide criminal justice objectives and
goals; develop and recommend a comprehensive criminal justice
strategy to achieve those objectives and goals; review and evaluate existing criminal justice policies and
programs and recommend new policies and programs to improve the quality of
justice in this State; coordinate programmatic and fiscal initiatives for State
criminal justice agencies; and act as the Governor's liaison to the Federal
government, other states, and localities within New York State, in connection
with matters relating to criminal justice. II. Personnel. The State Director of Criminal Justice shall be authorized
to use existing staff and resources of State agencies, which are hereby
directed to render full cooperation and assistance to the Director. Signed: Mario M. CuomoDated: January 11, 1983
[FN[DOUBLE DAGGER]] [Revoked by Executive Order No. 12
(Andrew M. Cuomo), infra.]
